programme.title: Savoring Paris

programme.desc: Beekeeper Eva uncovers an ancient fresco while rescuing a hive. Thinking it's the key to his research, a visiting archaeologist persuades her to help him on his quest across Malta.

programme.desc: Working on protecting the wildlife in Africa, a biologist teams up with a theme park designer who wants to create an over-the-top safari attraction.

programme.desc: A single mother (Nikki DeLoach) reinvents her struggling diner while spending time with a former high-school boyfriend (Andrew W. Walker) who's now a superstar baseball player.

programme.title: The 27-Hour Day
programme.desc: Taking a break from her wellness empire, an entrepreneur develops a budding romance with a handsome man at a relaxing retreat.

programme.desc: Aunt Dee splits her candy shop between her niece Maggie and maple farmer Dex. Following letters Dee left, the two uncover the reason for her decision during the Sweet Autumn festival.

programme.desc: Philadelphia mechanic Johnny learns his estranged father is a duke. The duke surprises him, as do his feelings for advisor Prudence.

programme.desc: Van announces he is quitting school to try out for arena football, but Reba's disapproval causes him to blow his chance.

programme.desc: Over Brock and Barbra Jean's objections, Reba gives Kyra permission to go on her first date, then discovers the boy is 17 years old.

programme.desc: Cheyenne suspects Van of cheating on her with a sexy publicist and kicks him out of the house.

programme.desc: Embarrassed about living with his mother-in-law, Van tries to pass Reba off as his maid; Brock tells Reba and Barbara Jean he wants to pursue his dream of golfing professionally.

programme.desc: Sophia decides to live in California with Dorothy's sister Gloria.

programme.desc: Rose makes a mistake when she allows her boyfriend to spend the night with her.

programme.title: Wedding of a Lifetime
programme.desc: A recently separated couple rekindle their romance when they're inadvertently entered into a nationally televised contest to compete for an all-expenses-paid wedding.

programme.title: Love in the Great Smoky Mountains: A National Park Romance
programme.desc: Sparks fly when former sweethearts reunite for an archaeological dig in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

programme.title: Royal Hearts
programme.desc: Montana rancher Hank learns that he's the last heir of the late King of Merania and has inherited the throne. His daughter Kelly convinces the reluctant royal to step in as king so the country can keep its independence.

programme.title: A Royal Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a princess and her bodyguard after her budding romance with an artist fizzles out.

programme.title: The Vows We Keep
programme.desc: An event planner must organize the perfect wedding for her sister in less than a month when she finds out that the Rosewood, a historic inn and beloved wedding venue, is being sold.

programme.title: Romance With a Twist
programme.desc: Former dancer Luna pairs up with Bennett, a world-class aerialist, when he finds himself without a partner for his upcoming performance at the local arts festival.
